title: Test SWR Binary Read - Utilities Demonstration
description: Demonstrates FloPy's SWR (Surface Water Routing) binary file reading utilities for processing stream network simulation results and extracting time series data

packages.purpose: Read water surface elevations from SWR stage files (.stg)
Extract flow budgets from SWR simulation results (.bud/.flow)
Read flow velocities between stream segments (.vel/.qm)

package_details.SwrStage: Binary file reader for water surface elevations
package_details.SwrBudget: Flow budget analysis from SWR simulations
package_details.SwrFlow: Stream segment velocity and connectivity data

key_features: SWR binary file format understanding and processing
Stream network connectivity and flow routing concepts
Water surface elevation time series extraction
Flow budget analysis and mass balance validation
Best practices for SWR post-processing workflows
learning_objectives: Understanding SWR binary file formats and structures
Mastering FloPy SWR utility classes for data extraction
Processing stream network simulation results effectively
Implementing time series analysis for hydrologic data
Validating flow budgets and mass balance closure
Creating post-processing workflows for SWR models
